Italy regulator fines TikTok $11 mln over inadequate checks on harmful contentItaly's antitrust regulator said on Thursday it has fined three TikTok units 10 million euros ($10.94 million) in total for not checking adequately content on its platform. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 09:33:20 GMT Z7KQFUWF3VO2JNUBN6I7Z6UQ7U https://www.reuters.com/technology/italy-regulator-fines-tiktok-11-mln-over-inadequate-checks-harmful-content-2024-03-14/Reuters技术
Vietnam urges respect of international law as China draws Gulf of Tonkin baselineVietnam's foreign ministry on Thursday said international law and the rights and interests of other countries must be respected, responding to a question about China's demarcation earlier this month of a baseline in the Gulf of Tonkin. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 09:10:40 GMT 666OINI5DRN2PNNYW57O65EV7Y https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/vietnam-urges-respect-international-law-china-draws-gulf-tonkin-baseline-2024-03-14/Reuters世界亚太地区
China launch of DRO-A/B satellite on Wednesday not successful - state mediaChina's launch of a DRO-A/B satellite from Xichang satellite launch centre on Wednesday was not successful, the official Xinhua news agency reported on Thursday. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 08:33:50 GMT A3WFEM6AGNJN7COGTHMGYKYVCU https://www.reuters.com/technology/space/china-launch-dro-ab-satellite-wednesday-not-successful-state-media-2024-03-14/Reuters技术空间
Proposed US TikTok ban 'not fair', China's foreign ministry saysThere is "no fairness to speak of" in citing national security to reduce the competitive advantage of other countries, a spokesperson of the Chinese foreign ministry said on Thursday, criticising a U.S. bill to force a TikTok divestiture or ban. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 08:26:27 GMT 4TW6BAXKNFLNNF3R5NMACRSUDA https://www.reuters.com/technology/proposed-us-tiktok-ban-not-fair-chinas-foreign-ministry-says-2024-03-14/Reuters可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
China's Tencent takes over two ByteDance video game teams - sourceChina's Tencent has taken over two ByteDance video games units after ByteDance retreated from the gaming business last year, according to a person familiar with the matter. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 08:16:54 GMT IUC6HIONCZPMRPVE5YZL35EAJ4 https://www.reuters.com/technology/chinas-tencent-takes-over-two-bytedance-video-game-teams-source-2024-03-14/Josh Ye技术
Exclusive: Chinese buyers cancel or postpone Australian wheat buys amid global oversupplyChinese wheat importers have cancelled or postponed about one million metric tons of Australian wheat imports, trade sources with direct knowledge of the deals said, as growing world stockpiles drag down prices. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 07:43:45 GMT ZNE2LLKACFKQZP6RA2JSC7AB4I https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/chinese-buyers-cancel-or-postpone-australian-wheat-buys-amid-global-oversupply-2024-03-14/Naveen Thukral市场商品
Blinken to visit South Korea next week, attend Summit for DemocracyU.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken will visit South Korea next week and hold a meeting on Monday with his counterpart, Cho Tae-yul, the foreign ministry in Seoul said on Thursday. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 07:40:03 GMT VT6KAKXHHZJX7JIA3G2JKD2RSA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/blinken-visit-south-korea-next-week-attend-summit-democracy-2024-03-14/Reuters世界亚太地区
China's top diplomat to visit Australia, New Zealand, says foreign minsitryChina's foreign minister, Wang Yi, will visit Australia and New Zealand from March 17 to 21, a spokeseperson said on Thursday at a regular press briefing. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 07:35:15 GMT CGHXC3BBTNJT3M24D64TCPI6JM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/chinas-top-diplomat-visit-australia-new-zealand-says-foreign-minsitry-2024-03-14/Reuters世界亚太地区
China cbank set to leave key rate unchanged on Friday amid uncertainty around Fed easingChina's central bank is expected to leave a key policy rate unchanged when it rolls over maturing medium-term loans on Friday, a Reuters survey showed, amid uncertainty over the timing of expected Federal Reserve interest rate cuts. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 06:30:53 GMT LEMJ6CVAQNIMDEQHM2PEHF5DU4 https://www.reuters.com/markets/rates-bonds/china-cbank-set-leave-key-rate-unchanged-friday-amid-uncertainty-around-fed-2024-03-14/Reuters市场宏观问题
Apple supplier Foxconn sees strong 2024 as Q4 beats forecastsApple supplier Foxconn said on Thursday it expects revenue to increase significantly in 2024 following a slow start to the year amid booming demand for AI servers, after it posted fourth-quarter profit that beat market estimates. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 06:29:03 GMT HQ3RFN75MBLUPP453CJYUQ6X2A https://www.reuters.com/technology/apple-supplier-foxconns-q4-profit-jumps-33-yy-beats-forecasts-2024-03-14/Yimou Lee, Faith Hung技术
China's Nio and CATL partner on developing batteries with longer lifeChinese electric vehicle maker Nio on Thursday signed an agreement with battery giant CATL on a partnership to develop batteries with a longer life as part of efforts to lower overall EV costs.
